alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; Calcasieu; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 1:09AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rapides, Beauregard, Calcasieu, Vernon, Allen, northwestern Jefferson Davis, northwestern Evangeline and northwestern Avoyelles Parishes, Hardin, southeastern Jasper, northern Jefferson, southeastern Tyler, Newton and Orange Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 108 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Timber Trails to near Sour Lake. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Port Arthur, Alexandria, Sulphur, Orange, Nederland, Groves, Pineville, Port Neches, Lumberton, Vidor, De Ridder, Bridge City, Oakdale, Leesville, Silsbee, Marksville, Westlake, West Orange and Vinton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 832. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 27. Interstate 210 near mile marker 1. Interstate 49 between mile markers 56 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central, southwestern and west central Louisiana...and southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; Calcasieu; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon; West Cameron
